known_issues: Header navigation menu item order needs adjustment: 'About Us' should appear after 'Industries We Serve'

existing_features.title: Update the top-level header navigation order so the menu item labeled "About Us" appears immediately after the menu item labeled "Industries We Serve" (and before "Contact Us") in both the desktop header navigation and the mobile menu.

new_feature_requests.summary: Reorder header navigation so 'About Us' menu item appears after 'Industries We Serve'

projectName: Reorder header navigation: move 'About Us' after 'Industries We Serve'
